basics.label: SW/HW Test Architect
basics.name: Vikas Chouhan
basics.summary: I am a test architect with ~15 years of experience in post silicon validation, embedded software development and Software QA, developing tests and architecting test frameworks and supporting infrastructure to shorten validation life cycles. I devoted some 2+ years in between to run an AI based healthcare startup which helped me to dive in application side AI/ML.

work.summary: Software QA Engineer for Intel Pytorch team.
highlights: QA activities for Intel Pytorch team enabling various training and inference workloads on their dedicated AI accelerator.
Architecting test (and test frameworks) for scaling test methodologies across huge number and variety of models.
Automating multiple aspects of test development, launch and debug process.

work.summary: Driving engineering R&D for our healthcare startup.
highlights: Successfully developed and deployed an AI system for detecting 50 skin disease conditions with an overall accuracy of >80%.
Enhanced our private image dataset with images available from various public sources on the web. This was open sourced as a Github project.

Read & implemented algorithms in various research papers which were not yet available in standard ML packages. One algorithm called OpenMax helped to improve our model's open set diagnostic sensitivity by ~10%.
Ran lots of experiments with visualization algorithms, loss functions, augmentations etc to optimize our AI models, improving our model's performance by ~6-8%.
Most of the work has been done remotely, collaborating over skype and zoom calls.

work.summary: Handling technical queries and issues from ARM Licensee partners.
highlights: Resolving technical queries and issues for ARM partners on a dedicated basis, increasing team's efficiency in dealing with issue resolution rate.
Developed a very solid understanding of Armv8-A architecture profile in this process.

work.company: NXP India Pvt Ltd (Formerly Freescale Semiconductor India Pvt Ltd)
work.summary: Software developer and post silicon validation engineer.
highlights: Developed validation tests in C & assembly for hunting various hardware issues in multicore processors, helping our team to catch serious silicon issues in time.

Developed & architected a software tool in C/C++ and Python for writing and generating algorithmic tests for multicore ARM processors. This helped us to port a lot of our PowerPC based tests to ARM based SOCs in a very time constrained window.
Developed validation tests to target cache coherency, memory consistency, multiple threads and shared execution units (SMT processors) along with few other IPs like interconnect, IOMMU etc.
Developed proficiency at low level hardware debugging via JTAG/PEX, bare-metal OS/kernel development/deployment & software modelling of CPU/SOC components.
Worked a little bit on IOT stacks and video decoding standards (H264, H265 etc.) as part of random small projects.
Worked on embedded micro kernels & board support packages.

work.company: NXP India Pvt Ltd (Formerly Freescale Semiconductor India Pvt Ltd)
highlights: Worked on enhancing our internal validation tools & fixing bugs and issues.
Ported them from SunOS to Linux helping our team move from old legacy Sun systems to newer & cheaper Linux systems.
